panel.label:
WIZARD EXAMPLE



These examples show the the integration with NETBEAN WIZARD API https://wizard.dev.java.net/

The example consists in a simple wizard that allows to generate bean from db

This wizard is a demo version of wizard provided by Bean Manager http://code.google.com/p/bean-manager/



The source code of the project could be check out from https://swixml2.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/examples/wizard
